question: Who created <image 1>?
description: The image is an impressionistic painting depicting a nude woman sitting outdoors in a natural setting. She is positioned with her back partially turned to the viewer, looking over her shoulder. The woman has long, flowing red hair and wears a wide-brimmed straw hat adorned with red flowers. Her body is draped with a white cloth that covers her lower body and part of her upper body, leaving her shoulders and arms exposed. The background features a soft, blurred landscape with hints of trees, water, and distant buildings, rendered in muted colors typical of the Impressionist style. The brushstrokes are visible and give the painting a textured appearance. In the bottom right corner of the painting, there is a signature that reads "Renoir," indicating the artist's name.
